name: Tiny Beat's: Ioni's Cut
description:
Hello all, Ioni here. This project is part of RMIT university's Games Design course, which I am apart of.

The premise was creating a game based around WarioWare's arcade style, fast paced gameplay, with the overarching theme of a "non-violent" game. It consists of 3 main micro-sized games played in quick succession with increasing difficulty.

This is a small piece of a larger scheme project named "Tiny Beats," which me and my fellow RMIT Games Design course students are developing, soon to be released in Itch.io.

Music acknowledgments:

Composer: Josh Hickman (insta: @joshhickmanmusic) and Ionatán Biniamin Maghidman
Producer: Lucas de la Rosa (lucasmigueldelarosa@gmail.com)
